name: Intel® RealSense™ Technology – ROS interface
tagline: Experimental support for Intel® RealSense™ Technology to the Robotic Operation System (ROS)
body:
In order to enable wide robotics ecosystem to come up with compelling usages based on latest Intel® RealSense™ technology, Intel is providing access to 3D cameras F200 (short range) and R200 (long range) under ROS. In order to get started and access a camera, see http://click.intel.com/intel-realsense-developer-kit.html

See more details on Intel RealSense program http://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/architecture-and-technology/realsense-overview.html

![](https://github.com/PercATI/RealSense-ROS/blob/master/img/R200_on_turtlebot.png?raw=true)

![](https://github.com/PercATI/RealSense-ROS/blob/master/realsense_dist_nav/1.0/doc/img/mapping_screen.png?raw=true)

You can find out more in our GitHub space: https://github.com/PercATI/RealSense-ROS
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
